body_html: @vfdev-5 I've been monitoring this page and given that it's gotten a decent amount of attention, I will probably move it up in my priority queue of things to do. Basically, when finished, the summary feature should be able to handle arbitrary graphs (e.g. multiple heads etc.) - this requires substantially more code, some of which I hacked up locally a while ago. I was planning to finish this up much earlier, but was backlogged as a result of various work. Currently I'm fairly busy with ECCV submissions and classes, so I was planning to look at this after March 14th (ECCV deadline), but I'll see if I can at least make some progress during the weekend.
